game.name: Monster Maze Runner
game.description:
Wow, a whopping amount of gold treasure is stored here! Join Monster Maze and be prepared to become a part of an epic journey of a sword warrior in the dungeon maze! Your winning will depend upon how wisely you guide your sword warrior in a labyrinth maze while looking for the fabulous treasure. Hey! You are not alone as the powerful sword will be in your hands to guard you against the deadly enemies. Kill them as you spot them before they do the same with you in this 3D latest action game!

Make sure to keep moving your character as the doors will be opened up automatically when he reaches near to them. Do not forget to collect the coins that you see along the way and keep your eyes on the enemy as they might come from any direction. Use your sword to defeat these bad souls and make your way of reaching the treasure with ease in this HTML5 shooting game! Control your monster to grab as much gold coins as you can, kill enemies and grab the gold treasure!

All it takes challenging your fighting and quick reflexes to the optimum level best to fight back against the multiple monsters who want to trap you here. Remember the number of monsters increases when you progress in this cool realistic fighting simulator. Be careful and try to complete your mission before the time and health expires in each level! Track your coins and health by looking at the top right corner of the screen! Play some more engaging and addictive action-packed shooting challenges on atmegame.com for free and have a blast online, no download required.
